text: Christopher Trujillo is an American record producer and recording engineer who is better known as Tito JustMusic. He is a former member of the production duo The Beamer Boyz who has worked for such stars as Ariana Grande, Meghan Trainor, Fifth Harmony, Mariah Carey Mark Ballas of Dancing with the Stars and Cheryl Cole. Christopher Trujillo was recently seen at the 2020 Oscars with Blac Chyna.
